entry.title: Jason's Whatever Adventure
entry.summary:
Author: piwozero

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,436Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 4

Summary: It is normal for 20-year-olds to experience an identity crisis, he thinks, but he didn’t have the luxury of analyzing himself during his teenage years. His teenage rebellion was all about being mad and angry (typical, if kind of extreme in his case), dead (not typical at all), executing revenge plans and fighting his dad (again – typical, but he might have been slightly immoderate). And so, he ended up as a less than well-adjusted young adult with little sense of self. Contains angst, fluff and crack, but isn't that just life?
